title: ESIC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 28 Senior Resident Posts
description: Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 28 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS can grab this chance and apply for the ESIC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. ...
